name: {Save It} – Rainbow Paperclips
description:
Save It

Rainbow paperclips

Secure beloved odds and ends in your journal or a letter to a friend.

This rainbow of paperclips is an effortless way to add a splash of color to your Gadanke book as you attach cool stuff.

Ship free with journal purchase.

Contains 6 paperclips.

name: {'Tis the Season} – Christmas Scrapbook and Card Holder
description:
'Tis the Season

A Christmas scrapbook and card holder

Celebrate the magic of your holiday stories.

Tuck away Christmas cards and memorabilia. Write your way through colorful pages of writing prompts that guide you toward reflection on past holidays, favorite moments and traditions. 

5.5x8 inches (14x20 cm)

How this this scrapbook celebrates your holiday stories:

This Christmas scrapbook offers a place to save all the holiday cards, newsletters and photos you cherish. Writing prompts guide your focus to the gratitude and joy of the season. Catch your stories during the holiday season or document the moments afterward. Scrapbook each day or whenever you get the urge. Give everyone in the family a different page or spent time around the table, documenting together. Imagine the keepsake this book becomes!

This scrapbook is larger than Gadanke’s “Joy to the World” Christmas journal and has additional pages. It comes with bigger binding rings, perfect for tucking away around 30 Christmas cards and other mementos.

Includes:

  • 56 pages of writing prompts
  • 1 patterned Christmas papers from Italy
  • 1 eco patterned Christmas paper made in USA
  • 2 4x6 inch (10x15 cm) holiday patterned papers
  • 3 red star sticker
  • 1 strip of green glitter tape
  • 1 green travel tag
  • 1 white envelope
  • 2 red raffle tickets
  • 1 holly green paperclip
  • 1 mini green envelope

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 46 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Creative exploration shouldn’t be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the binding and add treasured bits from your holiday.

Embrace the season. Capture more moments of celebration and reflection!

name: {She: Me, My Life, My Days} – Personal Journal 1.0
description:
She: Me, My Life, My Days

A personal journal

Express yourself. Define who you are.

Step into journaling like you’ve never done. Explore your inner self and all your secret wishes and hopes. Celebrate what makes you jump out of bed, and most important: document who you are.

For preteen to adult women.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal captures your stories:

This best-selling journal is the place for celebrating, "This is who I am!" It will gently lead you with a series of prompts, lists, and questions.

  • Reflect on your inner beauty, hopes, and regrets.
  • Evoke memories and beloved experiences.
  • Take note of favorite foods and activities, ones you haven’t tried, and ones you intend to master.
  • Insert favorite photos, postcards, and memorabilia.
  • Write on old school library cards, a doily, and other beautiful papers.
  • Dream.

Katie’s unique prompts aren’t direct thou-shall-write-this. They open your mind to reflections of your own.

Includes:

  • 50 pages of writing prompts
  • Patterned papers from Italy
  • A binding that opens and closes to rearrange pages and include precious bits from life.
  • Old school library cards, a hand-stamped pocket, a round white sticker, a doily, and a recycled envelope.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 50 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled.

Express your heart here.

This journal is She 1.0. Its accompaniment, She: Me, My Heart, My World (Version 1.1) , contains different colors, additional prompts, and embellishments. The two work well together or separately.

name: {She: Me, My Heart, My World} – Personal Journal 1.1
description:
She: Me, My Heart, My World

A personal journal

Document your world. Capture your heart.

What are your passions? What do you dreams for yourself and the world? What makes your heart soar? Define them here.

For preteen to adult women.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal catches your stories:

You'll find heaps of inspiration in the prompts, challenges, and questions. This book isn't your traditional day-to-day documenting journal; it helps you dig into the fabulous stuff that matters:

  • Recall childhood favorites.
  • Celebrate what makes you feel alive.
  • Reflect on people who’ve touched your life.
  • Document the world through your eyes and what you see, taste, and smell.
  • Make mini sketches and passionate notes.
  • Create lists and wishes for your future.
  • Tuck in photos, postcards, and memorabilia.
  • Celebrate you.

This journal is something you'll pull out years from now and say, "This is my story. It captures who I was and what I felt."

Includes:

  • 52 pages of writing prompts
  • Patterned papers from Italy
  • A binding that opens and closes to rearrange pages and include precious bits from life.
  • A mini blue envelope, hand-stamped envelope, two tags, and old school library card and sleeve.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 52 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Creative exploration shouldn’t be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the binding and add treasured bits from your life.

You are more than your job title or your day-to-day. Celebrate your story here.

This journal is She 1.1. Its accompaniment, She: Me, My Life, My Days (Version 1.0) , contains different colors, additional prompts, and embellishments. The two work well together or separately.

name: {Start The Story} – Prompt Tickets
description:
Start The Story

Prompt tickets

Add a prompt to your page and remove that blank journal page stress.

Designed and hand-stamped at Gadanke, these tickets make the perfect tool for adding a splash of color and titling your page, which is a great reference tool for when you flip through pages later.

Contains 10 tickets, four of each prompt and two that are blank.

Ships free with journal purchase.

How will you start the next story?

name: {Become} – Diary for Finding Your Direction
description:
Become

A diary for finding your direction

Acknowledge the creative whispers in your heart and explore your dreams.

You know that question: “So what do you do?”

It’s ok if you don’t know the answer! This journal will help you open your heart and slowly craft some plans.

For teen to adult women. Great for graduates.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal catches your dreams:

You’ll find floods of inspiration with lots of prompts, lists, and challenges. Unearth the creative direction in your hobby or career as you walk through the fun process of finding and setting your goals:

  • Define yourself
  • Find your creative passion
  • Discover who inspires you and why
  • Set aside others' opinions (perceived and otherwise)
  • Face your fears
  • Plan and dream
  • Attain your goals

Katie’s unique prompts help you focus on your heart.

Includes:

  • 76 pages of writing prompts
  • Mini envelopes with custom labels for exercises like listing fears that hold you back and writing a letter to your future confident self
  • Carnival tickets, a hand-stamped teensy tag, and square embellishing stickers
  • Patterned papers from Italy

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 76 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Creative exploration shouldn’t be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the binding and add treasured bits from your life.

Your creative whispers want to be heard; they need a safe place to emerge. They want to celebrate the woman you are meant to become.

name: {I Follow My Heart} – Personal Insight Scrapbook
description:
I Follow My Heart

Personal insight scrapbook

Step into the great desires and hopes in your heart.

Sometimes your heart understands things that your mind doesn’t. Your heart knows your loves and dreams. It knows your fears and confusions. It whispers hope to you. This handmade book is meant for releasing those whispers so you can really live as the person you’re meant to be.

For tweens to adults.

8x5.5 inches (20x14 cm)

How this journal opens your heart:

Part scrapbook and part journal, the prompts in this bound book craft a poem on a rainbow of paper from red to violet. Tuck away notes in the violet envelope.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 24 journaling pages are 30% recycled and bound with red German thread.

What’s your heart trying to tell you?

name: {For the Record} – Blank Fabric Journal
description:
For the Record

blank fabric journal

Jot down life’s great stuff in this blank journal.

Use this book to scribble lists. Jot down ideas. Sketch. Write stories. Take it to class and meetings. Katie always carries hers on planes; she tucks her airline tickets in the pocket and has a pretty place to write when inspiration strikes.

7.5x9.5 inches (19x24 cm)

How this journal captures your stories:

This 200-page notebook is wrapped in a bold, stitched fabric cover that’s lined with soft fleece fabric. When the pages are full, remove the notebook from the cover and slip in a new blank book.

Notebook made with recycled papers; fabrics from a local shop owned and operated by a mother with handmade business dreams.

Capture the bits of life in a beautiful book.

name: {Vintage Fabric Journal} – Blank Book
description:
Vintage Fabric Journal

blank book

This blank book is sure to be a favorite for note keeping and minibook making.

Your handmade book is built with vintage American fabric and a glossy American ribbon. It includes 35 blank pages of 100% recycled paper and an opening page that begins with Katie’s simple words of wisdom:

i find happiness when i quit trying to be perfect

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this notebook collects your stories:

It’s easy to tuck in your purse, take to class, or use as a mini album for pasting photos or business cards. It's easy to fill your book as full as you want by just tying the ribbon closed.

No two books will be alike due to variations in the cut of fabric.

Let this book become the beautiful place for writing all that love and brilliance within you.

vintage fabric journal 1

name: {Love Fills a Lifetime} – Wedding Card Scrapbook
description:
Love Fills a Lifetime

A wedding card scrapbook

Tell your love story; keep every card and memento in one place.

This scrapbooking journal is specially designed to hold all the cards and tokens of your wedding day and marriage. Document all the stories and dreams of your love story: from the day you two met to today.

For new brides or long-time couples who’ve kept wedding cards in a shoebox.

8x5.5 inches (20x14 cm)

How this book celebrates your love story:

  • Remember when the love began. Document old moments, favorite restaurants, nicknames, and inside jokes.
  • Recollect powerful stories from your wedding day and honeymoon. Write about joy and hopes, guests who made you laugh, favorite photos, and life as newlyweds.
  • Celebrate the love you share today. Now what are the favorite moments, nicknames, and inside jokes you share? What’s your home like? What do you dream?
  • Paste in favorite photos, ticket stubs, custom napkins, or honeymoon airline tickets on the photo spots and patterned papers from Italy.
  • Collect all the congratulatory cards and notes from everyone in your life, including each other, in three divided sections.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 40 journaling pages are 100% recycled. A love story shouldn’t be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the extra large binding and add life’s treasured bits with ease.

Note: Product photos are the journal documenting Katie and Martin’s love story; their journal holds approximately 40 cards. Extra large rings can be purchased here.

Let love fill this lifetime, not a shoebox under the bed. Share that love in these pages.

name: {A Note to Say Hi} – Card & Letter Holding Journal
description:
A Note to Say Hi

card and letter holding journal

This journal is all about friendship, family, and the letters we send each other.

A collection of letters is one of the most beautiful stories of life. You don’t want to toss those precious cards and sentimental letters into haphazard places around the house. Keep them together with this scrapbooking journal.

8x5.5 inches (20x14 cm)

How this journal celebrates your stories:

  • Collect letters you receive in the tabbed sections for safekeeping.
  • With prompts, commemorate people you love who are near and far.
  • Celebrate who you are with several letters to yourself.
  • Feel a deep sense of gratitude as you pull your collection together.
  • Document memories.
  • Add mementos to your stories like photographs and postage stamps.
  • Embellish with the enclosed mini envelopes, carnival tickets, stickers, paperclips, and patterned vellum papers from Germany.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 46 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Creative exploration shouldn’t be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the binding and add treasured bits from your life.

Note: Product photos are from Katie's journal; it holds approximately 60 cards, postcards, and letters. Extra large rings can be purchased here.

Keep the notes from people you lose close to your heart.

name: {You Are Loved} – Baby Book
description:
You Are Loved

A baby book

Celebrate first moments. Chronicle milestones. Embrace future hopes.

Document the beautiful journey of baby’s first year – or few! Writing prompts help you record ordinary days, favorite foods and first words. Write when you feel inspired or write every day. Easy-open ring closures let you tuck in photos and other mementos.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this book celebrates baby:

  • Tell the story. Finding out a baby would be joining your world, witnessing the first views at an ultrasound, introducing the baby to family and celebrating baby’s first holiday season – they’re all here.
  • Record moments. Pause to chronicle the thoughts you experience while watching baby sleep, bundling up for a crisp autumn day and seeing Daddy snuggle his child.
  • Document milestones. Fill out growth charts, lists of firsts, and notes on favorites. Use of-the-moment prompts for the daily routines and moments that quickly change throughout the months.
  • Embellish your book with the enclosed beautiful paper from Italy, pockets, color block stickers, old school library card, tickets, special paperclip and more.
  • Open the binding, tuck in the extras. Insert photos, hospital bands, interesting receipts ,newspaper clippings, etc.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 92 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Colors inside the journal coordinate with the selected cover. All prompts are unisex.

Baby, you are so loved. It’s chronicled here.

  • Psst - This journal easily adapts into a “life book” or baby book for an adopted child.
  • Grandparents, aunts, godparents and friends will enjoy this baby brag book.

name: {Baby Hello} – Brag Book
description:
Baby Hello

A brag book

Grandmas, aunts, godparents, and friends: prepare to brag.

It doesn't matter how many miles separate you and this beautiful new child. The prompts in this handmade book will help you express your deep love.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this book celebrates baby:

  • Tell the stories in your heart. How did you feel when you learned the child would be joining your world? How about the first time you held her?
  • Laugh and make silly predictions. What’ll be the baby’s best school subject? His favorite thing to do with you?
  • Document hope. What do you dream for the little girl? What do you hope you can give?
  • Brag.
  • Embellish your book. Includes 3 translucent papers from Germany, a mini envelope, stickers, raffle tickets, a heart-shaped paperclip, and a hand-stamped tag.
  • Open the binding; tuck in extras. Add photos, cards, printed emails, and bits of life.

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing this book. All 42 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Creative exploration shouldn't be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the binding and add treasured stuff from life.

Imagine the stories this love letter will hold.

  • Psst – Looking for a baby book for Mom and Dad to document the milestones? Check out the "You Are Loved" baby book.

name: {Add More Love} – Extra Large Rings
description:
Add More Love

Extra large rings

Hold more cards; add more stories.

Do you need bigger, much bigger rings to hold everything in your journal? These extra large rings are twice the size of the rings in the {Note to Say Hi} stationery holder and {Love Fills a Lifetime} wedding scrapbook , allowing more room for all the love letters and notes you've received.

3 inches diameter (7.6 cm). Contains 2 rings.

name: {Journey} – Travel Journal
description:
Journey

A travel journal

Where are you going? Take this book with you and capture the journey.

You’ll find creative, exciting ways to document your adventure with this writing prompt journal. Write about the sounds, surprises, local moods, and people you travel with. Enclose all the mementos, photos, and brochures.

For all ages.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal chronicles your adventure:

  • Document facts. Includes a mini calendar, space to journal or paste travel stubs and receipts, and prompts on how you chose this adventure.
  • Briefly journal each day with daily documenting pages. Spend five minutes jotting down the events that happen each day. When you have time for more journaling, you'll already have this sequential record.
  • Map it. With classic star stickers and mini maps, flag your destinations and show where you’ve been.
  • Record details with writing prompts. Capture everything from the shops you peek in to the time you get lost.
  • Make your book beautiful. Embellish your stories with the enclosed pocket, tags, and patterned papers from Italy.

Travel journaling shouldn’t be forced in a bound book, so this journal allows you to open the binding and add treasures like postcards and photos from your trip. Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 60 journaling pages are 100% recycled.

Where are you going? What do you want to remember?

  • Need multiple travel journals? Buy 3 at once and save.
  • Want extra daily documenting pages and embellishments for a longer adventure?

name: {Journey} Family Pack – 3 Travel Journals
description:
Journey

3 travel journals

Where are you going? Take three of these travel journals with you and capture the journey.

You’ll find creative (exciting!) ways to document your group's adventure. Explore the sounds, surprises, local mood, and the people you journey with through writing prompts. Paste in all the mementos, photos, and brochures.

For all ages. Great for honeymooners.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How these journals capture the adventure:

  • Chronicle facts with casual itinerary pages. Includes a mini calendar, space to journal or paste travel stubs and receipts, and prompts on how you chose this adventure.
  • Briefly journal each day with daily documenting pages. Spend 5 minutes jotting down the events that happen each day. When you have time for more journaling, you'll already have this sequential record.
  • Decorate with classic star stickers and mini maps. Flag your destinations; show where you've been.
  • Record details with writing prompts. Capture everything from the shops you peek in to the time you get lost.
  • Make your book beautiful. Embellish your stories with the enclosed pockets, Italian patterned papers, and tags.

Travel journaling shouldn't be forced in a bound book, so this journal allows you to open the binding and add treasures like postcards and photos from your trip. All 60 journaling pages are 100% recycled.

Where are you going? What do you want to remember?

  • Perfect for kids and adults. Honeymooners, too!
  • Need an individual journal?
  • Want extra daily documenting pages and embellishments for a longer adventure?

options.name: 1 each: Sandy Beach, Blue Lagoon, Summer Sun

name: {Extend the Journey} – Travel Journal Expansion Kit
description:
Extend the Journey

travel journal expansion kit

Where are you going? What are the moments you never want to forget?

This expansion kit goes hand-in-hand with the {Journey} travel journal for longer adventure. It includes Gadanke's beloved vacation daily documenting pages and bright embellishments.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this kit adds to your travel journal:

These quick daily pages take less than 5 minutes to fill out while you’re on the go each day. Later, they're a fabulous resource for jogging your memory when you want to journal more in-depth about your adventure.

The {Journey} travel journal contains 8 itinerary pages (which cover 4 to 8 vacation days) plus all the fabulous prompts Gadanke’s known for. This colorful kit contains 14 additional daily documenting pages. They’re pre-punched and ready to insert into your travel journal.

Also included are:

  • 2 atlas pages
  • glitter tape
  • 1 mini envelope
  • 1 luggage tag
  • 1 yellow and black arrow sticker
  • 1 shaped paperclip
  • 2-3 bright round stickers
  • 1 restaurant receipt and carbon paper

Capture the moments. Remember the journey.

name: {Joy to the World} – Christmas Journal
description:
Joy to the World

A Christmas journal

Celebrate the joy of your stories this season.

Imagine the holiday keepsake this book becomes! Write your way through colorful pages of writing prompts as you document joys of the holiday, tuck away Christmas cards and memorabilia and reflect on past holidays and traditions.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal celebrates your holiday stories:

This Christmas journal helps you focus on the gratitude and joy of the season. Write a page each day. Journal whenever you get the urge. Give everyone in the family a different page or sound time writing in it together. This journal also makes a great scrapbook for after the holidays. However you approach it, crafting this journal is sure to be a tradition you'll look forward to every year.

This journal is smaller than Gadanke’s “'Tis the Season” Christmas scrapbook and card holder and has smaller binding rings.

Includes:

  • 44 pages of writing prompts
  • 2 patterned Christmas papers from Italy
  • 3 4x4 inch (10x10 cm) or 3 4x6 inch (10x15 cm) holiday patterned papers
  • 1 red star sticker
  • 1 strip of green glitter tape
  • 2 glittery candy cane stickers
  • 1 travel tag
  • 2 mini envelopes
  • 2 red raffle tickets
  • 1 cherry red paperclip
  • 3 buttons

Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 44 journaling pages are 30% or 100% recycled. Creative exploration shouldn’t be forced in a book of numbered pages, so this book allows you to open the binding and add treasured bits from your holiday.

Welcome more moments of reflection and celebration this season!

name: {Dreaming} – Storycatching Kit
description:
Dreaming

storycatching kit

Tell me what you're excited about. What are your dreams and the stories you want to tell?

The stories we tell can make us feel alive. Don’t hold them in your heart. Commit them to paper! Use this kit to capture them. Add these pages to another Gadanke journal, or make it a collection of stories on its own.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

Your 33-piece storycatching kit includes:

  • 2 round blue stickers
  • 1 yellow rectangle sticker
  • 1 floral Italian paper
  • 2 pearl brads
  • 1 vintage envelope with a pink lining

  • 1 blue paperclip
  • 2 round pink stickers

Your kit is hand-cut and packaged in a ready-to-gift packet.

Designed to fit all Gadanke journals. (Though pages are smaller than wedding and xl Christmas books.)

Tell those stories; document those dreams.

name: {Shhh... It's a Shower} – Storycatching Kit
description:
Shhh... It's a Shower

A storycatching kit

It's party time! What are the experiences you want to remember?

This brightly colored kit is inspired by the enclosed shower invitation. Is it for a baby shower or a bridal shower? It's your call! Either way, this kit is sure to throw a beautiful splash of color into any scrapbook or Gadanke journal.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

Your 35-piece storycatching kit includes:

  • 21 mixed papers including 30% recycled, graph, and more from sustainable forests
  • 1 patterned paper from Italy
  • 1 vintage shower invitation and envelope
  • 1 high heel paperclip
  • 1 mini star gem with sticky back
  • 1 pink envelope
  • 1 large blue tag
  • 1 library card
  • 2 round pink stickers
  • 2 smaller blue round stickers
  • 1 yellow luggage tag
  • 1 foam sticker with a phrase like "love" or "kiss me"
Note: These pages fit Gadanke's 4x5.5 inch journals, not the larger 5.5x8 inch journals.

Keep the memories strong.

name: {Nature Journal} – Storycatching Kit
description:
Nature Journal

storycatching kit

There are hopes and joys in your heart. Are you writing them down?

Sometimes there are more moments to document than your Gadanke journal can hold. Inspired by the Montana backcountry, these pages and pieces keep the story going.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

Your 35-piece nature kit includes:

  • 2 flourish squares from ledger paper
  • 1 brown jute ribbon
  • 2 copper star stickers

  • 1 handmade elephant poo paper

Your kit is hand-cut and packaged in a ready-to-gift packet. Grizzly bears not in sight.

Get creative with adding extras to your journal. Hole punch these new pages to match your journal. (Just use a page from your journal as a template.) Give your journal a little personality! Make it YOU.

Designed to fit all Gadanke journals (except wedding and xl Christmas books).

name: {Bookworm} – Storycatching Kit
description:
Bookworm

storycatching kit

Make your journal one of those thick, juicy books that cause a bookworm to faint.

Sometimes there are more moments to document than your Gadanke journal can hold. With a salute to bookworms and librarians, use this kit to expand and embellish your stories. Or turn this kit into a minibook or scrapbook of its own.

storycatching kit

Won't You Drop In?

The Vintage Traveler

storycatching kit

name: {Silver Winter} – Storycatching Kit
description:
Silver Winter

storycatching kit

Dim the lights; give your journaling a little mood with this silver scrapbooking kit.

This expansion kit offers plenty of journaling space and fun embellishments to restock your journal make storykeeping extra fun.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal chronicles your adventure:

You’ll find creative, exciting ways to document your adventure with this writing prompt journal. Write about the sounds, surprises, local moods, and people you travel with. Enclose all the mementos, photos, and brochures.

  • Document facts. Includes a mini calendar, space to journal or paste travel stubs and receipts, and prompts on how you chose this adventure.
  • Briefly journal each day with daily documenting pages. Spend five minutes jotting down the events that happen each day. When you have time for more journaling, you'll already have this sequential record.
  • Map it. With classic star stickers and mini maps, flag your destinations and show where you’ve been.
  • Record details with writing prompts. Capture everything from the shops you peek in to the time you get lost.
  • Make your book beautiful. Embellish your stories with the enclosed pocket, tags, and patterned papers from Italy.

Travel journaling shouldn’t be forced in a bound book, so this journal allows you to open the binding and add treasures like postcards and photos from your trip. Wind energy and environmentally friendly dyes were used in producing many parts of this book. All 60 journaling pages are 100% recycled German paper.

Kids also get to giggle over silly stuff like:

  • Yipes! What if I had a tail?
  • What’s the route to the secret treasure I hid today?
  • What are some of the fill-in-the-blanks in my brain when I read things like: feed the man in the moon a _____ or eat five thousand _____

Jump in! SPLASH! Doodle. Draw. Write. Add photos. Slap on the stickers. Explore.

  • 1 German vellum star paper
  • 1 green library card
  • 2 candy cane twist ties
  • 3 red star stickers
  • 1 brown bag rectangular sticker
  • 2 red carnival tickets
  • 1 yellow star paperclip
  • 2 red and green burlap trims

Your kit is hand-cut and packaged in a ready-to-gift packet. In addition to fitting the large European {Joy to the World} journal, this kit also fits other large journals including {Note to Say Hi} stationery holder, and {Love Fills a Lifetime} wedding scrapbook.

Add more holiday cheer to your journal this season.

name: {Dear Santa} – A Letter Writing Kit
description:
Dear Santa

A letter writing kit

To Santa from a favorite little friend.

This letter writing kit makes writing to Santa extra exciting for kids. It lets them get crafty, doodle, decorate, and practice their penmanship. As an added bonus, the bound minibook also makes a fabulous keepsake that captures your child's Christmas dreams.

5x7 inches (12.7x18 cm)

Your kit includes:

  • 1 vintage Santa card cover (made in the USA)
  • 8 bound pages of vintage school lined paper
  • 4 bound red pages with an introduction (child's name, location, and date)
  • 1 mini tag
  • 3 red star stickers
  • 7 inches (18 cm) of green glitter tape
  • 1 brown kraft sticker
  • 1 100% recycled brown bag envelope

Capture your child's Christmas dreams.

name: {Love Letter} – Minibook for Someone You Love
description:
Love Letter

A minibook for someone you love

Celebrate love.

This handmade book provides the perfect tool for expressing your love and gratitude. For Mom. For a spouse. For an unborn child. For someone you love with all your heart.

4x6 inches (10x15 cm)

How this book celebrates your passion:

  • The left-hand pages are a love poem, expressed one line per page, to prompt your feelings.
  • The right-hand pages have blank lines for telling your story.

All 24 journaling pages are 100% recycled paper from Germany. The cover is patterned paper from Italy and is bound with German thread.

Katie's love letter project:

I wanted to give my husband an anniversary that documented a whole year. Every month, I wrote two pages to him and added a photo. Today he keeps that little book on his desk with his grandfather's watch and his wedding band.

The world needs more love letters, don't you think?

name: {The Little Things} – Gratitude Journal
description:
The Little Things

A gratitude journal

Celebrate the good things in life.

The clever prompts in this journal evoke cherished memories, future hopes and gratitude for tiny moments of joy. They remind you of the little details — like this journal’s beautiful letterpress cover! — that make life sing.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

How this journal celebrates the little things:

After a long, exhausting day, exhale with the brief and powerful fill-in-the-blank prompts in this book. Remind yourself to be thankful for and revel in “a bowl full of...” or “a friend who....” Tuck it into your purse and write on the go. Keep it by your bed, or sit down at the table to write to your heart’s content.

All 28 journaling pages are 100% recycled. The cover is Italian letterpress paper bound with German thread.

Imagine there’s a little pocket in your heart labeled “all my thanks.” That’s where this journal lives.

name: {Seal It} – Neon Washi Tape
description:
Seal It

Neon washi tape

Add a splash of color to your journal with Katie's favorite paper tape.

These on-trend tapes add so much to your journal pages. They're a pretty tool for adhering photographs and bits of life, and they're such a simple, colorful embellishment that you can stick anywhere.

.6x39.4 inches (1.5x100 cm)

name: {Post It} – Vintage Stamps
description:
Post It

vintage stamps

Add vintage letter writing love to your journal pages and art projects.

This collection of vintage stamps was carefully preserved during the lifetime of one American man. Each stamp was postmarked, then he carefully removed each one from its envelope. His collection was sealed in the 1960s, only to be opened just now for you.

Stamps range from the 1890s to 1960s. Selection varies from photograph.

Ships free with journal purchase.

Contains 15 stamps.

name: Upgrade to Priority Shipping
description:
Upgrade to Priority Shipping

Available worldwide

Love journaling? Start sooner.

Upgrade your order's shipping with the United States Postal Service's Priority Mail. That way your mailman will really hustle to drop off your Gadanke goodies sooner!

name: {Sparkle} – Glitter Journal Pages
description:
Sparkle

glitter journal pages

Add some sparkle to your story.

This twinkling kit is a must-have for your journaling supplies. Embellish your journal, add shimmering pages, adhere photos, and emphasize your words with this glitter-filled collection.

4x5.5 inches (10x14 cm)

Your 13-piece sparkly kit includes:

  • 1 sheet of glitter paper
  • 2 eco-friendly, translucent papers from Germany
  • 2 strips of glitter tape, each 6 inches long (15.5 cm)
  • 1 shaped paperclip
  • 3 self-adhesive glitter dots
  • 3 shimmering heart or star stickers
  • 1 eco-friendly, translucent paper from Germany, 2.75x5.5 inches (7x14 cm)

Now that is a story worth noticing.

Happy Note: Unlike a bottle of glitter, the sparkle in this kit doesn't get everywhere. Yahoo! The candy dots may shed trace amounts of glitter, but that should be it!

description:

name: {Right Now} – Day of the Week Stickers
description:
Right Now

day of the week stickers

Monday. Tuesday. Thursday. Wednesday. Add a sticker; know the day.

These day of the week stickers are a simple, bright embellishment for your journal page or craft project. Use them to add a title, a bold date, or an extra detail to your journal page. (They make a great reference tool for when you flip through pages later, looking for a specific date in life.)

Ships free with journal purchase.

Contains 21 stickers, 3 of each day of the week.

name: {In the Clouds} – Rub Ons
description:
In the Clouds

rub ons

Going on airplane and hot air balloon adventures, daydreaming in the clouds, skipping through Cloud 9...

Whenever your heart's in the sky, embellish your journal page with clouds, too. These rub ons are a lot like stickers. Instead of peeling them off a paper, you position the sheet over your journal page or other surface. You use the enclosed stick to rub the image onto your project's surface with firm pressure. The look is clean without the rough edges you get from a sticker.

Ships free with journal purchase.

Package contains one 5x3.75 inch (12.7x9.5 cm) sheet of 25 clouds and rubbing stick.

Celebrate those stories; they're worthy.

Use it for writing letters. Or hole punch and add a golden touch to your journal.
